columns.Event_ID: The unique identifier for each event.
columns.Date: The date when the event takes place.
columns.Venue: The location where the event is held.
columns.Name: The title or name of the event.
columns.Event_Attendance: The number of attendees at the event.

event.table_description: The table records details of various events including attendance.

columns.journalist_ID: The unique identifier for each journalist.
columns.Name: The full name of the journalist.
columns.Nationality: The country of citizenship for the journalist.
columns.Age: The current age of the journalist.
columns.Years_working: The total years the journalist has been working.

journalist.table_description: The table stores information about journalists including their experience.

columns.journalist_ID: The unique identifier for each journalist involved in reporting.
columns.Event_ID: The unique identifier for each event being reported on.
columns.Work_Type: The type of work performed by the journalist during the event.

news_report.table_description: The table captures the reporting activities of journalists at various events.
